description: This file contains the implementation of advanced interface functions for the Http Simple Client Object, including functions for polishing requests, browsing responses, and handling notifications within an HTTP client module.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpScoBspPolish(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoReq,ANSC_HANDLE hReqContext)
methods.description: Prepares or adjusts the request message before transmission.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpScoBspBrowse(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoReq,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoRep,ANSC_HANDLE hReqContext)
methods.description: Processes the response received from the web server.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpScoBspNotify(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG ulEvent,ULONG ulError,ANSC_HANDLE hReqContext,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoReq,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoRep)
methods.description: Handles asynchronous notification events related to the request.

ctags.name: HttpScoBspNotify
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG ulEvent,ULONG ulError,ANSC_HANDLE hReqContext,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoReq,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoRep)
